DESCRIPTION: The next attack deals #b1 more damage per #yGoop [REMOVE_SPACE], removing all #yGoop and triggering any #yConsume effects.
Instruct a slime to perform their end of turn action immediately.
0-cost cards that apply #yGoop with a variety of secondary effects.
High-damage #yAttacks that also deal a small amount of damage to you.
Bonus effect which activates when an #yAttack is used on an enemy who has #yGoop [REMOVE_SPACE].
Buff that lasts for the rest of combat. A slime can have multiple different enchantments, but a single enchantment does not stack with itself.
Buried cards will always be chosen last for random #yExhume effects.
Your minions #yCid and #yPike have their own energy, and spend it at the end of your turn to attack a random enemy. If they have none, they will instead gain 1 energy.
